firmwares.release_notes: Refactored the JSON parsing for the updated update.json file.

fixed: Fixed JSON parsing functionality to ensure it works correctly with the the new update.json structure

added: The system now auto downloads and flashes itself with the latest firmware
LED Breathing added in loop function to test and indicate successful OTA update

firmwares.release_notes: Initial version with groundwork for OTA firmware updates.

added: Version checking and display on serial monitor
Fetching firmware url from Github if update is available
